latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Previously cited violations corrected

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed that children and staff failed to wash hands after using lavatory after diaper changing prior to preparation of food or when else required
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection inside temperature of between 68 deg F and 72 deg F was not maintained when outside temperature registered below 55 deg F
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children
Child care service providing care without a staff member trained in First Aid/CPR on site at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
